sentences.english: She is also a dynamic and sporty girls.
sentences.chinese: 她也是一位具有活力的運動型女孩。

sentences.english: We are looking for energetic candidates with good caliber to join Shanghai Representative Office.
sentences.chinese: 我們誠聘充滿活力及有才能的人士加入上海代表處。

sentences.english: I am a hardworker, have lots of energy and am a quick learner
sentences.chinese: 我是一個勤快的勞動者，學習能力強而且非常有活力。

sentences.english: Probiotics contain live micro-organisms, so-called good bacteria that colonize the intestine.
sentences.chinese: 益生菌含有活力微生物，可以在腸道內存活繁殖。

sentences.english: Because people have lives. And now, people with lives also have broadband.
sentences.chinese: 因爲人們需要活力，而且現在人們的生活離不開寬帶。

sentences.english: Whose action is no stronger than a flower?
sentences.chinese: 美，她的活力比一朵花還柔脆。

sentences.english: Down town Naperville gives you a feel of a charming small town; yet with a big city dynamics. There are many restaurants;
sentences.chinese: 瑞珀市中心是一個迷人的小鎮，但也有大城市的活力。

sentences.english: That is the animation of this medallion.
sentences.chinese: 這正是這個獎章的活力所在。

sentences.english: The underlying strength of the U. S. economy is gradually re-asserting itself.
sentences.chinese: 美國經濟的內在活力又一次逐漸釋放出來了。

sentences.english: The more you do this, the more alive you will feel.
sentences.chinese: 你越是這樣做，就越覺得自己充滿活力。

sentences.english: A short, spikey style is a short hairstyle that gives you a modern and edgy look.
sentences.chinese: 短而向四外張開的髮式讓你看起來更時尚和充滿活力。

sentences.english: First, we should develop a dynamic, innovation-driven growth model.
sentences.chinese: 創新驅動，打造富有活力的增長模式。

sentences.english: The movement of is important from the perspective of revitalising Japan's economic dynamism.
sentences.chinese: 從重振日本經濟活力這一角度看，流動非常重要。

sentences.english: The world is looking forward to seeing a dynamic and energetic UN.
sentences.chinese: 世界殷切期待一個充滿生機與活力的聯合國。

sentences.english: The growth speed of hypha was partly correlated with the change of enzyme activity.
sentences.chinese: 菌絲的生長速度與酶的活力變化有一定的相關性。

sentences.english: Money-seekers also score lower on tests of vitality and self-actualization.
sentences.chinese: 追求金錢的人活力和自我實現力相對更低。

definition: full of youthful energy (idiom); vigorous/energetic/a bright spark
opportunity to live/to reprieve from death/life force/vitality
